KnowledgeBase.Title: subi
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: addi divi muli iadd isub imul idiv

Function.Description: The subi function returns the difference all of its arguments .

Brief.Overview: The subi function returns the difference all of its arguments starting from the leftmost arguments and returns the result as an Integer quantity.
Brief.Usage: Use the subi function to subtract two or more numbers and return the result as an Integer. The subi function will truncate any fractional portion of its operands before subtracting.

Syntax.Return: Returns the result of the add operation
